title: "What are the instructions for a successful chain meditation practice?"
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discusses a method to achieve a life of coherence and autonomy. He advises analyzing one's day in hindsight and visualizing the next, all with detachment. By doing so, he suggests that a person can gain control over their impulses and contingencies. In the last 200 tokens, the author explains how to organize one's day. The day should start with contemplating the sunrise, which should be followed by an active representation of the upcoming day. The midday should be dedicated to focusing, and the evening should end with revisiting the day's events and visualizing the following day. These exercises will integrate to produce a unique and central quality, giving participants control over their life. Finally, the author claims that only serious and willing individuals should follow this path of personal development.

last_phrase: In conclusion, organizing your day with a revision of the past, predetermined visualization of the future, and contemplation of the rising sun before sleeping, along with active representation of the day's content upon waking up, is a great way to integrate various exercises for a unique and central experience.
